'''Gambler's Brooch''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Gambler]].

==Description==
Gamblers like to flaunt their wealth, although their money can disappear overnight.<br />She would wear this huge, exotic flower ornament on her ears. It certainly catches the eye.<br />But what they would not see is the trick dice carefully hidden within the flower.<br />The gambler would only sneak this dice out of the brooch in an urgent situation.<br />Swapping in this dice under the vigilant eyes of the guests was how she turned the table around.
